links.title: List account rulesets
links.description: Fetches all rulesets at the account level.

links.title: Create account ruleset
links.description: Creates a ruleset at the account level.
links.curl:
curl -X POST "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/01a7362d577a6c3019a474fd6f485823/rulesets" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"name":"My ruleset","description":"My ruleset to execute managed rulesets","kind":"root","phase":"http_request_firewall_managed","rules":[{"description":"Execute the OWASP ruleset when the IP address is not 1.1.1.1","expression":"ip.src ne 1.1.1.1","action":"execute","action_parameters":{"id":"4814384a9e5d4991b9815dcfc25d2f1f"},"ref":"my_ref","enabled":"true","logging":{"enabled":"true"}}]}'

name.description: The human-readable name of the ruleset.

description.description: An informative description of the ruleset.

rules.description: The list of rules in the ruleset.

description.description: An informative description of the rule.
description.example: Execute the OWASP ruleset when the IP address is not 1.1.1.1

expression.description: The expression defining which traffic will match the rule.

action.description: The action to perform when the rule matches.

action_parameters.description: The parameters configuring the rule action.

ref.description: The reference of the rule (the rule ID by default).

enabled.description: Whether the rule should be executed.

logging.description: An object configuring the rule's logging behavior.

enabled.description: Whether to generate a log when the rule matches.

anyOf.description: The unique ID of a rule.

links.title: Get an account ruleset
links.description: Fetches the latest version of an account ruleset.

links.title: Update an account ruleset
links.description: Updates an account ruleset, creating a new version.
links.curl:
curl -X PUT "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/01a7362d577a6c3019a474fd6f485823/rulesets/2f2feab2026849078ba485f918791bdc" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"description":"My ruleset to execute managed rulesets","rules":[{"description":"Execute the OWASP ruleset when the IP address is not 1.1.1.1","expression":"ip.src ne 1.1.1.1","action":"execute","action_parameters":{"id":"4814384a9e5d4991b9815dcfc25d2f1f"},"ref":"my_ref","enabled":"true","logging":{"enabled":"true"}}]}'

description.description: An informative description of the ruleset.

rules.description: The list of rules in the ruleset.

description.description: An informative description of the rule.
description.example: Execute the OWASP ruleset when the IP address is not 1.1.1.1

expression.description: The expression defining which traffic will match the rule.

action.description: The action to perform when the rule matches.

action_parameters.description: The parameters configuring the rule action.

ref.description: The reference of the rule (the rule ID by default).

enabled.description: Whether the rule should be executed.

logging.description: An object configuring the rule's logging behavior.

enabled.description: Whether to generate a log when the rule matches.

anyOf.description: The unique ID of a rule.

links.title: Delete an account ruleset
links.description: Deletes all versions of an existing account ruleset.

links.title: List account ruleset versions
links.description: Fetches the versions of an account ruleset.

links.title: Get an account ruleset version
links.description: Fetches a specific version of an account ruleset.

links.title: Delete an account ruleset version
links.description: Deletes an existing version of an account ruleset.

links.title: Create account ruleset rule
links.description: Adds a new rule to an account ruleset. The rule will be added to the end of the existing list of rules in the ruleset.
links.curl:
curl -X POST "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/01a7362d577a6c3019a474fd6f485823/rulesets/2f2feab2026849078ba485f918791bdc/rules" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"description":"Execute the OWASP ruleset when the IP address is not 1.1.1.1","expression":"ip.src ne 1.1.1.1","action":"execute","action_parameters":{"id":"4814384a9e5d4991b9815dcfc25d2f1f"},"ref":"my_ref","enabled":"true","logging":{"enabled":"true"}}'

description.example: "Execute the OWASP ruleset when the IP address is not 1.1.1.1"
description.description: An informative description of the rule.

expression.description: The expression defining which traffic will match the rule.

action.description: The action to perform when the rule matches.

action_parameters.description: The parameters configuring the rule action.

ref.description: The reference of the rule (the rule ID by default).

enabled.description: Whether the rule should be executed.
Whether to generate a log when the rule matches.

logging.description: An object configuring the rule's logging behavior.

links.title: Update an account ruleset rule
links.description: Updates an existing rule in an account ruleset.
links.curl:
curl -X PATCH "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/01a7362d577a6c3019a474fd6f485823/rulesets/2f2feab2026849078ba485f918791bdc/rules/3a03d665bac047339bb530ecb439a90d" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"description":"Execute the OWASP ruleset when the IP address is not 1.1.1.1","expression":"ip.src ne 1.1.1.1","action":"execute","action_parameters":{"id":"4814384a9e5d4991b9815dcfc25d2f1f"},"ref":"my_ref","enabled":"true","logging":{"enabled":"true"}}'

links.title: Delete an account ruleset rule
links.description: Deletes an existing rule from an account ruleset.

links.title: Get an account entry point ruleset
links.description: Fetches the latest version of an account entry point ruleset for a given phase.

links.title: Update an account entry point ruleset
links.description: Updates an account entry point ruleset, creating a new version.
links.curl:
curl -X PUT "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/01a7362d577a6c3019a474fd6f485823/rulesets/phases/http_request_firewall_managed/entrypoint" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"description":"My ruleset to execute managed rulesets","rules":[{"description":"Execute the OWASP ruleset when the IP address is not 1.1.1.1","expression":"ip.src ne 1.1.1.1","action":"execute","action_parameters":{"id":"4814384a9e5d4991b9815dcfc25d2f1f"},"ref":"my_ref","enabled":"true","logging":{"enabled":"true"}}]}'
